# fetchHistory(withFetch:)

**Type Method**

Retrieves history based on a fetch request.

## Declaration

```swift
class func fetchHistory(withFetch fetchRequest: NSFetchRequest<any NSFetchRequestResult>) -> Self
```

## Parameters

- **fetchRequest**: The fetch request that defines the history bounds.

## Return Value

A persistent history fetch request ([doc://com.apple.coredata/documentation/CoreData/NSPersistentHistoryChangeRequest]) built using an existing fetch request.

## Fetching History

- **fetchHistory(after:)**: Retrieves history since a given date.
- **fetchHistory(after:)**: Retrieves the request history after a given token.
- **fetchHistory(after:)**: Retrieves history since a given transaction.
